attributes.action: Enact legal requirement for coroners to notify the MoD of all military sucides.
attributes.background:
Having served twenty two years as a regular soldier then a short period as a full time reverist I was medically discharged with a plethora of psychological injuries. 
It becomes harder and harder to watch from afar as lives are lost and hollow words are muttered

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/225899

We've been trying to get in touch with you about your petition but we didn't hear back from you. The above petition is now open and has received a response from the Government. If you'd like to start a new petition once this one has closed, we'd be very happy to help you.
